description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, specifying callback methods for OCI container lifecycle events using JSON data objects.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class declaring callback methods for OCI container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container starts, provides container name and JSON data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container stops, provides container name and JSON data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container fails, provides container name and JSON data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container's state changes, provides container name and JSON data.
